backend/main.mo: Main backend orchestrator actor with user profile management, agent registry (Skippy, GLaDOS, Robby), debate state control, file metadata registry, blob storage mixin, and role-based access control using Internet Identity principals.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four high-confidence requirements: removing the Sensory Cortex Principal input field, simplifying upload button validation to file-only check, routing chunks to backend Orchestrator's upload_chunk, and calling route_document with 5000-character preview after upload completion.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of all frontend files describing the tactical dark UI with Internet Identity auth, tabbed navigation (boardroom/sensory/health), agent registry C2 dashboard, file ingestion with chunking, and debate display with speech synthesis.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based neutral grayscale color palette for tactical dark aesthetic, supporting both light and dark modes with custom CSS variables for all UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for 'The Gang' voice assistant application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component with three tabs (boardroom/sensory/health), Internet Identity authentication, push-to-talk debate initiation, emergency mode badge, and conditional rendering of DebateDisplay, SensoryCortexTab, and AgentRegistryTable.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table displaying all agents with real-time online/offline status indicators (green/red), kill switch toggles using shadcn Switch component, and tactical dark styling with neon green accents.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Displays live debate status with transcript, speaker info, and badges for emergency/locked states. Automatically triggers text-to-speech for Robby's responses when authenticated.
Provides a button to interrupt/stop the debate by canceling speech synthesis and calling the backend abort mutation.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Implements a push-to-talk button using speech recognition that captures user voice input and returns the transcript when recording stops.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: Handles file upload via drag-and-drop or file input, chunks large files into 1.8MB pieces, extracts previews, and routes documents to the Sensory Cortex agent.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking for the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for debate operations (start, abort, status polling), document routing, and agent management with placeholder principals for future canister integration.
Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech Recognition API to capture voice input with start/stop controls and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom React hook that wraps the browser's Web Speech API for text-to-speech, with support for selecting British male voices and managing speech state (speaking/stopped).
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub file for future integration of Picovoice Porcupine wake word detection to trigger speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, including design tokens for borders, backgrounds, and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes transcript text by removing HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown links into clickable anchor elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing The Gang multi-agent system architecture with 8 AI agent canisters plus 1 ingestion canister on Internet Computer, including known issues with Sensory Cortex UI Principal validation blocking file uploads.
